title: Experimental design - explain one week DO change

content.prompt: Why did the DO after one week decrease as the amount of waste increased?

choices.label: The algae could not consume the waste fast enough.
The turbidity of the water increased, and the algae population increased.
The algae multiplied and then died and decomposed.
The CO2 increased due to algal respiration.
The oxygen came out of solution into the air in the laboratory.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
